item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Welcome to Dr.Goose’s blog!

This is the first English post to test the multilingual functionality.

Features

  • Language switching
  • Multilingual content support
  • Responsive design

Getting Started 1

You can switch between languages using the language switcher in the navigation bar.
